child.title: Get Creative With ZubHub
child.1: Connect with a global community  of curious creatives.
child.2: Freedom to express yourself in different creative ways.
child.3: Work as a team with co creators.

teams.title: ZubHub for Teams
teams.1: Set your team up for success with reimagined learning to empower their personal and professional growth.
teams.2: With inspiring activities on science, art, technology and more, your whole team will have deep knowledge and expertise at their fingertips.

1.review: â€œFor me, ZubHub has grown incredibly important. I would advise anyone interested in creating projects and sharing to check it out.â€
1.name: Faridah Ejibunu

2.review: â€œThe fact that anyone in the world can have an online presence for their work and show it to the world all for free just amazes me.â€
2.name: Hemant Kumar Singh

3.review: â€œZubHub contributes immensely to people from not so well socio-econimic backgrounds, I would high recommend it.â€
3.name: Yaya Mamoudou

global.title: Join a growing community of thousands of creators!
global.body: Be a part of an active community of educators and creators.
global.body2: Create projects, create activities, share ideas, and connect with the global community.
